name: Tyger Guzman
title: Full-Stack Software Engineer | Data Science & Analysis | AI Research
summary: Software Engineer & Security Specialist with a 20-year history of turning complex data into actionable enterprise intelligence. I bridge technical architecture and business valueâ€”engineering solutions across full-stack development, automated fraud detection, and adversarial AI research.

subRoles.title: Lead: Security Awareness
highlights: **Engineering Leadership:** Direct the technical roadmap and modernization of the Security Awareness data infrastructure, ensuring security requirements are met across the application lifecycle.
**Containerized Modernization:** Architected a Python, Docker, and Kubernetes (K8s) environment via GitLab CI/CD to scale security telemetry, leveraging Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) practices.
**GenAI Innovation:** Engineered a GenAI/LLM-based Jira metadata engine (POC) using Python to automate quarterly performance audits, correlating story points with technical delivery.
**Governance Authority:** Appointed Technology Information Custodian (TIC); authored the Document Development Life Cycle (DDLC) to manage risks and meet security compliance/audit requirements.
**Vendor Integration:** Developed custom API integrations to aggregate security engagement metrics from third-party vendors into a centralized, actionable executive dashboard.

subRoles.title: Internal Fraud Monitoring
highlights: **Fraud Detection & Risk:** Identify and manage emerging risks through automated surveillance models. Developed complex SAS code and IBM DataStage ETL pipelines to monitor and control business risks.

**Database Architecture:** Manage a dedicated Oracle database environment, including schema design, table creation, and metadata lineage documentation, ensuring data integrity across enterprise systems.
**CRM Systems:** Built and optimized a full-stack Salesforce environment to automate fraud case tracking and investigative workflows for the internal security domain.

subRoles.title: Member Identity & Access Management (MIAM)
highlights: **Full-Stack Security:** Developed member-facing React components and Java Spring Boot APIs for the Security Preference Portal, focusing on secure authentication and authorization workflows.

**Internal CRM Tooling:** Designed and built a distinct internal CRM front-end to allow Service Representatives to manage member identity and secure authentication preferences for millions of members.
**Fraud Systems Engineering:** Assigned to USAA's Internal Fraud Monitoring team to engineer automated surveillance models and risk patterns using SAS and IBM DataStage.
**Data Integration:** Successfully integrated disparate enterprise data sources (Snowflake, DB2, Oracle, and SQL Server) to enhance internal threat detection capabilities.
**Performance Conversion:** Demonstrated high-impact technical delivery and systems-first problem solving, resulting in a direct full-time conversion to USAA within 5 months.

**Global M&A Integration:** Spearheaded technical data reconciliation for the FedEx M&A, synchronizing massive global datasets across Teradata, MSSQL, Oracle, and DB2 to ensure 100% data integrity during the merger transition.

**Customer Matching & Registry:** Mastered the FedEx in-house customer matching analysis tool to identify discrepancies across disparate systems, drawing inferences to update and validate critical customer data within the global registry.

**TIBCO Data Virtualization (TDV):** Architected complex virtualized data layers and semantic views to provide real-time reporting capabilities, successfully bypassing the latency and hardware overhead of traditional physical ETL processes.

**Source-System Analysis:** Conducted deep-dive source-system analysis to massage raw data and engineer custom SQL input tables, ensuring backend data was fully optimized for high-performance TIBCO Spotfire visualizations.

**Custom Write-Back Tooling:** Engineered a specialized 'Write-Back' tool within the TIBCO environment to allow manual data corrections to be written directly to source systems, resolving critical reconciliation gaps in the global ledger.

**Executive Intelligence Dashboards:** Developed advanced TIBCO Spotfire and Tableau visualizations utilizing complex filter schemes and dynamic control properties to translate backend telemetry into actionable executive insights.

**Full-Stack Analytics Development:** Built responsive web interfaces (HTML/CSS/JS) and custom visualization components using Python and R to meet highly specific cross-functional business requirements for distributed global teams.
**Engineering Leadership:** Directed a team of developers in best practices for SDLC, Agile methodology, and advanced data modeling, ensuring the high-performance delivery of analytics platforms.

**Voice Recognition & Analytics:** Deployed and maintained enterprise voice recognition systems (Verint); piloted Acoustic Sentiment Analysis and Biometric Sentiment Triggers to track agent fatigue. Analyzed acoustic patterns and linguistic triggers to detect representative burnout.

**TIBCO Spotfire Architecture:** Architected enterprise-level TIBCO Spotfire Executive Intelligence Dashboards for real-time operational analytics. Engineered end-to-end data pipelines from Cisco CUIC telephony systems using complex SQL, Python, and R automation scripts.

**Cisco Telemetry Integration:** Acted as the primary technical subject matter expert for Cisco CUIC reporting. Configured custom reporting threshold alerts and backend data-push intervals to ensure high-fidelity synchronization between telephony events and workforce management platforms.

**Systems Administration:** Served as SharePoint Site Collection Administrator for department operations, managing secure collaboration platforms and the internal deployment of business intelligence tools for distributed leadership teams.

**Full-Stack Reporting Interfaces:** Designed and maintained responsive web-based interfaces for internal reporting tools. Successfully integrated automated Excel-based dashboards with interactive Spotfire components for executive leadership.

**VBA-Based Process Automation:** Engineered a custom VBA 'Reset Tool' utilizing Avaya API objects to programmatically clear 'stuck' agent states. This automation eliminated manual leadership intervention and recovered thousands of productive hours.
**Intraday Staffing Optimization:** Managed real-time labor costs by executing 'Early Release' (ER) protocols and adjusting lunch/break durations based on live volume trends.
**Real-Time Floor Monitoring:** Executed continuous monitoring of global call center operations to ensure strict adherence to Service Level Agreements (SLAs).
**Tactical Workforce Tooling:** Developed Excel-based automation tools to streamline daily workforce tracking. Replaced labor-intensive manual data entry with automated workbooks.
**Real-Time Scheduling Adjustments:** Performed daily data analysis to optimize agent schedules and manage immediate staffing requirements.
**Cross-Site Collaboration & Mentorship:** Partnered with leadership across geographic locations to standardize reporting and operational protocols.

**Financial Stewardship & P&L Management:** Directly responsible for maintaining and increasing Gross Profit and Gross Profit Margins through strategic pricing, waste reduction, and labor optimization.
**Operational Excellence & Standards:** Enforced rigorous store standards for merchandising, safety, and customer experience. Managed end-to-end inventory logistics.
**Talent Development & Pipeline Engineering:** Orchestrated the full lifecycle of human capital management, including interviewing, hiring, and onboarding.
**Training & Methodology:** Standardized operational procedures by delivering a hybrid training model of on-the-job mentorship and technical computer-based coursework.
**Strategic Workforce Scheduling:** Developed and managed complex staff schedules to align labor hours with peak customer traffic patterns.
**Inventory Control & Asset Management:** Directed comprehensive inventory audits and lifecycle management.

AI & Machine Learning: Achitectural Fragility & Instruction Hierarchy Inversion in LLMs
Computer Vision & Image Processing: Open The Eyes: High-Fidelity Generative Restoration Pipeline
Information Architecture & Knowledge Man: Knowledge Engineering: Persona-Based Career Logic & Dossier Synthesis
Synthetic Data: Seed-Stability & Character Consistency Pipeline
